summary: This bill, the Strengthening Supply Chains Through Truck Driver Incentives Act of 2025, proposes a refundable tax credit for commercial truck drivers. The credit amount is $7,500, increasing to $10,000 for new drivers. Eligibility requirements include a valid Class A commercial driver's license, adjusted gross income limits, and a minimum number of driving hours. The bill also includes provisions for apprentices and an inflation adjustment. It amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 and has a termination date of December 31, 2026.
